a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: The total number of terrorism-related incidents per year. The source defines a terrorist attack as: "the
threatened or actual use of illegal force and violence by a non-state actor to attain a political, economic,
religious, or social goal through fear, coercion, or intimidation." The perpetrators of the incidents must be
sub-national actors; data does not include acts of state terrorism.
